meanings.definition: To write or transcribe in Braille.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys brailling stories for her blind friend.
meanings.sent2: He is brailling a letter to his pen pal.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried brailling its name with its paw in the sand.
meanings.sent4: The artist brailled emotions onto the canvas with textured paint.
meanings.sent5: The teacher demonstrated brailling techniques to the students.

meanings.definition: The act of reading or writing using the Braille system.
meanings.sent1: Learning brailling can open up new worlds for the visually impaired.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her brailling skills every day.
meanings.sent3: The library had a section dedicated to brailling materials.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced across the brailling on the page.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit featured interactive brailling displays.
